name: Youtube Material REUPLOAD
description:
The Youtube Material Style by Cello was one I loved, but recently it's been taken down, and the icons removed from imgur. 
I have taken the liberty of recreating these images as best I can, and altering the style so that it can be used again. 
If user Cello wants this gone, so be it, but for now, here's the red-light material style for use once again.
